datascience.src.pipeline.parsers.ers.batch_parse(ers_xmls: List[str])[source]¶

Parses a list of ERS messages and return 2 tables as DataFrames containing the information extracted from the messages.

Parameters

ers_xmls (List[str]) – list of ERS xml messages

Returns

Dataframe with parsed metadata, including a “value” column

with json data extracted with the xml message

pd.DataFrame: Dataframe with parsed metadata, including a “xml_message” column

with the original xml message

Return type

pd.DataFrame
